title: IT60115: Embedded Low Power Systems - Quick Facts

Course name | Embedded Low Power Systems
Offered by | Information Technology

Previous Year Grade Distribution
{{{grades}}}
Semester | Autumn

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Prerequisite: NoneIntroduction to Embedded and Low Power VLSI Systems. Embedded Ubiquitous Control Architecture for Low Power Systems. Power optimization and synthesis at behavioral and Systems level using formal methods. Multi-objective synthesis of low power real-time distributed embedded systems. Memory exploration for low power embedded systems. Dynamic power management. High level power analysis and optimization. RTL synthesis of low power embedded systems. Low power embedded systems in ultra deep sub-micron technologies.
